word:
Then He tells you to use these talents to His glory. Improve them. How shall we improve them? As God gives me light, as God gives you light, 


                                       -253- 

as He has given you His precious Word. It is full of hidden treasures. He wants you to explore, work the field, and you will find the treasures, and you will sell everything that you might buy the field that contains the treasure. There are the jewels of truth that are to be searched for as hidden treasures.
